Enter the new question information below. Questions can be multiple choice, true/false, or fill-in-the-blank. You can enter your choices below after the question.
Enter up to 5 possible choices for the answer to this question. More choices can be added later.
Each question has a specific number of points applied towards the total quiz grade.
Modify the question information below.
This question may include an optional image, video or audio clip. Select the media type and enter the URL to the media file OR click the "Upload" button to upload the media file.
To add a question select the "Add New Question" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.

To edit the Question -- click the question. To edit choice -- click the Choice. To add new choice -- click "add choice". To select correct choice -- click radio button. To add a question select the "Add New Question" link in the upper right hand corner of this page. The Lesson must have the Quiz checkbox selected to be available.

Click the Button Below to Identify Yourself.

After correcting the following questions, return to another Lesson or go back to the Class by selecting an option at the bottom of this page. Check the "Grade This Quiz" checkbox to regrade this quiz. Questions are marked with a Green or Red check for correct and incorrect answers. The correct choice for each question is bolded.

Click the appropriate selection for each question. After answering all questions, return to another Lesson or back to the Class by selecting an option at the bottom of this page. Uncheck the "Grade This Quiz" checkbox to skip this quiz.
This is how your quiz will appear to the members. Click the "Continue" button below.
